      • addGrade

        public void addGrade​(CourseDetails courseDetails)
              throws DBActionsException
        adds CourseDetails object's values to the gpa table in the db. The CourseDetails argument was instantiated before and must hold all correct (not null) values.

        This method inserts object values via insert statement.

        Specified by:
        addGrade in interface ISimpleActions
        Parameters:
        courseDetails - an instantiated CourseDetails object holding the values of a course
        Throws:
        DBActionsException - if an sql exception occurred

      • newGPA

        public java.lang.Double newGPA​(java.lang.String courseName,
                               java.lang.Integer newGrade)
                        throws DBActionsException
        calculates and returns updated gpa after changing a specific grade. func receives name of the course which its final grade will be changed and the new grade courseName needs to be correct name of the course and grade between 0-100(this is final grade already) this func gives the user the opportunity to check how his gpa will change by entering a different grade

        func gets the details list of the table via the getGradeTable method. func get details of the specific course it needs to change via the getCourse method it calculates the sum of all the final grades multiplied by their specific credits value it subtracts the present course grade multiplied by its credits and than adds the new course grade multiplied by the same credits than the sum is divided by the sum of the credits in total(hence the credit_sum param)

        Specified by:
        newGPA in interface IFindNewGPA
        Parameters:
        courseName - correct name of the course that its grade would be replaced
        newGrade - new grade entered by the user to replace the precent grade in the calculation
        Returns:
        calculated total grade gpa
        Throws:
        DBActionsException - if an sql exception occurred
        See Also:
        - class with the gpa calculation methods
